meanings.definition: A large letter, as a capital letter.
meanings.sent1: The title of the book was written in MAJUSCULES to make it stand out.
meanings.sent2: In English, the first letter of a sentence is usually a majuscule.
meanings.sent3: The giant robot's name was spelled in MAJUSCULES on its chest.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like a MAJUSCULE, impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The billboard displayed the company's logo in bold MAJUSCULES.

meanings.sent1: The ancient manuscript was filled with MAJUSCULE letters.
meanings.sent2: The official document was required to be written in MAJUSCULE font.
meanings.sent3: The invitation was so fancy, even the date was in MAJUSCULE script.
meanings.sent4: The grand entrance was marked by a MAJUSCULE archway.
meanings.sent5: The royal decree was adorned with intricate MAJUSCULE designs.
